data.title: Disney's Great Mouse Detective Basil of Baker St. by Whatsits Galore
data.text:
MORE GREAT MOUSE DETECTIVE: BASIL'S CASE-BOOK BASIL'S DISGUISES NOT BASIL MORE DISNEY: VILLAINS BIRDS ALIENS MICE TRIVIA GLITCHES DUCKS COSTUMES COLLECTIBLES TWINS See the size chart used by the Disney animators.

Scan the floor plans to Basil's flat.

Read Dr. Dawson's notes on the limits of Basil of Baker Street.

Examine some errors in The Great Mouse Detective.

Keep in touch with Basil's own Facebook page.

Enjoy these comics featuring Basil and company.

Study some drawing tips for the artistically inclined.

Browse collectibles from The Great Mouse Detective.

Learn your ABCs with a little help from GMD.

Revisit the crew who brought The Great Mouse Detective to the screen.

Admire this unused ad campaign artwork by Michael Hobson.

Revel in unusual sightings of the GMD characters.

Check your collection against this pin list, formerly on PinPics.

Beware these bootleg postage stamps, being offered for sale.

Observe a section of the original story board used in the making of the film.

Peruse the film's plot synopsis onimdb as it once stood.

Identify this collectible listed on eBay.

View some videos from Disney, including one of Basil animated to the voice of Basil Rathbone.

Visit Sherlock Holmes, Basil's Mentor.

On July 2, 2013, Disney's D23 website featured a one-day tribute to The Great Mouse Detective (and rightly so), which we have preserved for posterity.
